text: A gubernatorial election was held on 7 April 2019 to elect the next Governor of Tottori. == Candidates == *Shinji Hirai* back by LDP, CDP, Komeito, DPFP. *Hideyuki Fukuzumi for the JCP. *Hiroshi Inoue. == Results == http://shingetsunewsagency.com/2019/04/13/conservative-landslide-in-unified- local-elections/ == References == Category:2019 elections in Japan Category:Gubernatorial elections in Japan Category:April 2019 events in Japan Category:Politics of Tottori Prefecture
title: 2019 Tottori gubernatorial election
